    question => string (901) "<p>Has a reconciliation of each class of biological asset been disclosed, in...
    $value[13]['question']
    <p>Has a reconciliation of each class of biological asset been disclosed, including:</p>
<ul>
    <li>brought forward carrying amount;</li>
    <li>the gain or loss arising from changes in fair value less costs to sell;</li>
    <li>increases resulting from purchases;</li>
    <li>decreases resulting from sales and biological assets classified as held for sale (or included in a disposal group that is classified as held for sale) in accordance with IFRS 5;</li>
    <li>decreases resulting from harvesting;</li>
    <li>increases resulting from business combinations;</li>
    <li>net exchange differences arising on the translation of financial statements into a different presentation currency, and on the translation of a foreign operation into the presentation currency of the reporting entity;</li>
    <li>other changes; and</li>
    <li>carried forward carrying amount?</li>
</ul>
